extendedIngredients.name: potato
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3/4 cup mashed potato (made with fat-free milk)

recipes.title: Creamy Chicken Boxty

winePairing.pairingText: Chicken can be paired with Chardonnay, Pinot Noir, and Sauvignon Blanc. White meat is typically paired with white wine as to not overpower the flavor of the meat, so chardonnay and sauvignon blanc are safe choices. Chicken prepared with a tomato sauce or certainly a red wine sauce can and should be served with a red like a pinot noir. You could try Mercer Estates Zephyr Ridge Vineyard Reserve Chardonnay. Reviewers quite like it with a 5 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 35 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Mercer Estates Zephyr Ridge Vineyard Reserve Chardonnay
productMatches.description: Aromas of apricot, guava and pineapple juice mingle with hints of sweet vanilla and warm toasty notes.

recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                Place grated potato in a colander to drain; squeeze to remove excess liquid. Pat dry. In a large bowl, combine the grated potato, milk, flour, mashed potato, salt and pepper. Let stand for 20 minutes.                                                                                            Meanwhile, in a large nonstick skillet, cook bacon over medium heat until crisp. Add mushrooms and leek; cook until tender. Gradually add cream. Whisk together flour and milk; add to pan. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Stir in the chicken, salt and pepper; heat through. Remove from the heat and keep warm.                                                                                           Coat another large nonstick skillet with cooking spray; heat over medium heat. Pour 3/4 cup batter into center of skillet; lift and tilt pan to coat bottom evenly. Cook until top appears dry; turn and cook 2-3 minutes longer. Remove and keep warm. Repeat with remaining batter, coating skillet with cooking spray as needed.                                                                                           Spoon filling onto pancakes.                                        Yield: 4 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Creamy Chicken Boxty in  Healthy CookingFebruary/March 2012, p22                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 boxty equals 434 calories, 9 g fat (3 g saturated fat), 72 mg cholesterol, 515 mg sodium, 52 g carbohydrate, 3 g fiber, 33 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: Place grated potato in a colander to drain; squeeze to remove excess liquid. Pat dry. In a large bowl, combine the grated potato, milk, flour, mashed potato, salt and pepper.
Meanwhile, in a large nonstick skillet, cook bacon over medium heat until crisp.
Add mushrooms and leek; cook until tender. Gradually add cream.
Whisk together flour and milk; add to pan. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Stir in the chicken, salt and pepper; heat through.
Remove from the heat and keep warm.
Coat another large nonstick skillet with cooking spray; heat over medium heat.
Pour 3/4 cup batter into center of skillet; lift and tilt pan to coat bottom evenly. Cook until top appears dry; turn and cook 2-3 minutes longer.
Remove and keep warm. Repeat with remaining batter, coating skillet with cooking spray as needed.
